name: Pineapple Island Trial
description:
There is a beautiful island that produces all kinds of sweet fruits. One year, farmers planted super sweet pineapples. People fell in love with them as soon as they ate them. Farmers began to plant them in large quantities, but some pineapples changed.

Some feature list as follows:
1. This is a stress relief and simple game. Nobody die.
2. Player can upgrade ability from weapon store.
3. Player need find some way to eat the boss pineapple.
